Articles.Content:
Hi! I'm not that new here (about 20 hours across both ksps) but I just wanted to know how to install and copy/remove craft files from my ksp2 game.

P.S. I am using direct download on v1.2.0

You know, I haven't tried that yet. 

Now someone can tell both of us.
Good! I just found a cool craft file and made a cool plane that I'd like to share with the community!
I am on steam so I am not sure if it is the same, but my files are in  run>%appdata%>Local low>Intercept>KSP2> Saves>Player>Workspaces

On the root of the system drive it should be 'Users/<username>/Appdata/LocalLow/Intercept Games/Kerbal Space Program 2/Saves/SinglePlayer/<savename>/Workspaces'

I think that's right.

Also, in the VAB, you can highlight a craft and press Ctrl + C to copy it to the clipboard as text.  This can then be pasted to wherever you need.

Additionally - Welcome to the forum!


Happy landings!

23 hours ago, Starhawk said:

On the root of the system drive it should be 'Users/<username>/Appdata/LocalLow/Intercept Games/Kerbal Space Program 2/Saves/SinglePlayer/<savename>/Workspaces'

I think that's right.

Also, in the VAB, you can highlight a craft and press Ctrl + C to copy it to the clipboard as text.  This can then be pasted to wherever you need.

Additionally - Welcome to the forum!


Happy landings!

Thanks! It worked and will be sharing my craft files soon.
